::Battera::

She looked at him with a quizzical look on her face.  She stopped walking 
and stood there.
"Uh...well...I have the red face, the brown body and black wings of a flying 
fox fruit bat."  She had to think about this.  No one had ever asked that 
one before.
"I guess I have the color variation for camoflage in the tree's canopy."
She took a step forward, stopped and stepped back.  She looked at 
Cybershark.  "What made you come up with that question?  No one ever asked 
about my coloration before."


----------Original Message----------
>From: Dachande85@...

>Subject: Neo Beast Wars
>::CyberShark::
>
>     "I'll walk you out of the base," CyberShark said to Battera. He was 
>really starting to like her. "I was wondering, how did you become such
>different colors, for a bat I mean?"
